hero.title: Help Center
hero.description: Find answers to your questions and get the support you need.

createAccount.question: How do I create an account?
createAccount.answer: Click the 'Sign Up' button in the top right corner, fill in your details, and verify your email address.

helperVsCustomer.question: What's the difference between a Helper and Customer?
helperVsCustomer.answer: Helpers offer services to others, while Customers book services. You can be both on the same account.

completeProfile.question: How do I complete my profile?
completeProfile.answer: Go to your profile page and add your skills, experience, photos, and availability to attract more clients.

howPaymentsWork.question: How do payments work?
howPaymentsWork.answer: Regular service payments are made in cash at the time of service delivery. For the wallet system, taskers can pre-pay through bank transfers or payment points to add credits to their wallet.

paymentMethods.question: What payment methods do you accept?
paymentMethods.answer: Service payments are made in cash on delivery. The wallet system (for taskers) accepts bank transfers and payment at various payment points across Morocco.

whenGetPaid.question: When do I get paid?
whenGetPaid.answer: Taskers receive payment in cash immediately upon service completion. For wallet credits, they are added instantly after payment confirmation at the payment point.

verifyHelpers.question: How do you verify Helpers?
verifyHelpers.answer: All Helpers undergo background checks, identity verification, and skill assessments before joining our platform.

notSatisfied.question: What if I'm not satisfied with a service?
notSatisfied.answer: Contact our support team within 24 hours. We'll work with you to resolve the issue or provide a refund.

personalInfoSafe.question: Is my personal information safe?
personalInfoSafe.answer: Yes, we use industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect your data. Read our Privacy Policy for details.

safetyTips.title: Safety Tips
safetyTips.description: Stay safe while using our platform
